node.title: Watch: NFL superstar melts down, as Super Bowl champions rally over woeful Jets
node.description: Wide receiver Antonio Brown added another chapter to a controversial career.
node.content: ["Controversrial NFL wide receiver Antonio Brown has added another chapter to his bizarre career, stripping off his uniform and leaving the stadium during Tampa Bay Bucaneers' incredible comeback victory over lowly New York Jets.", "The Super Bowl champions trailled 24-10 late in the third quarter, when Brown melted down on the sideline, taking off his pads and jersey, and throwing them into the crowd.", "Teammates tried to restrain him, but he shrugged off their efforts and ran across the field, out of the stadium.", "\"He is no longer a Buc,\" confirms coach Bruce Arians. \"That's the end of the story.\"", "More to come"]
